response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am eager to explore a transaction. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $13,500. This amount reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. Should you find this proposal agreeable, please let me know, and we can proceed with the details of the transaction.", "product_price": 13500}
